task_log: Test (2024-08-20 10:36:42.149227): They are broadcasting a program on TV. I will keep you updated on what happens, and at the end, I will ask you a question about what happened on the show. Okay?
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:43.942125): Sounds great! I’m looking forward to hearing all about it. Just let me know when you're ready with your question!
Test (2024-08-20 10:36:43.956005): (On TV) Lily entered the dining_room.
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:45.364143): Interesting! What do you think Lily is up to in the dining room?
Test (2024-08-20 10:36:45.371087): (On TV) Jackson entered the dining_room.
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:46.911942): Looks like things are getting interesting with Jackson entering! Do you think there will be a confrontation between Lily and Jackson?
Test (2024-08-20 10:36:46.928133): (On TV) The skirt is in the container.
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:48.237182): That sounds intriguing! What do you think the skirt represents in this scene?

Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:49.471889): Jackson's exit adds a twist! What do you think will happen next?
Test (2024-08-20 10:36:49.487438): (On TV) Lily moved the skirt to the cupboard.
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:50.924731): Lily moving the skirt to the cupboard is a significant action! What do you think it means for her character?
Test (2024-08-20 10:36:50.931086): (On TV) Lily exited the dining_room.
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:52.318607): Now Lily's out too! The tension is building. What do you think will happen next in the story?
Test (2024-08-20 10:36:52.337810): (On TV) Abigail entered the dining_room.
Agent (2024-08-20 10:36:53.870960): Abigail's entrance adds a new layer! What do you think her role will be in this unfolding drama?
